DOC.brief_title: Corneal Barrier Function With Multi-Purpose Solutions

DOC.criteria: Adapted daily soft contact lens wearer , least 18 year age , vision correctable 20/40 Ocular systemic allergy , abnormality cornea , active ocular infection , prior keratorefractive surgery , use ocular medication
